original_text: These were the locations of their settlements allotted as their territory (they were assigned to the descendants of Aaron who were from the Kohathite clan, because the first lot was for them):
korean_text: 그들의 거주한 곳은 사방 지계 안에 있으니 그들의 마을은 아래와 같으니라 아론 자손 곧 그핫 종족이 먼저 제비 뽑았으므로

sentences.original_text: These were the locations of their settlements
they were assigned to the descendants of Aaron
who were from the Kohathite clan
because the first lot was for them
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 첫 번째 제비가 그들을 위한 것이었기 때문입니다
